title: Former Spanish PM Zapatero in Caracas to join talks on political amnesty
summary_full: Critics argue Zapatero’s emphasis on dialogue has at times muted criticism of rule-of-law violations under both Hugo Chávez and Nicolás Maduro
summary_public: Critics argue Zapatero’s emphasis on dialogue has at times muted criticism of rule-of-law violations under both Hugo Chávez and Nicolás Maduro
